statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_policies;
SELECT policy_name, priority_level FROM network_traffic_policies;
SELECT id, policy_name, policy_details FROM network_traffic_policies WHERE priority_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_policies WHERE traffic_type = 'HTTP';
SELECT id, policy_name, traffic_type, priority_level FROM network_traffic_policies ORDER BY priority_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_policies WHERE priority_level > 5 ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT id, policy_name, traffic_type FROM network_traffic_policies WHERE traffic_type = 'Internal' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT policy_name, priority_level FROM network_traffic_policies WHERE priority_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY priority_level DESC;
SELECT id, policy_name, policy_details FROM network_traffic_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%Security%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_policies WHERE priority_level < 3 AND traffic_type = 'External' ORDER BY priority_level ASC, policy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_policies;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_ip_address FROM network_devices;
SELECT policy_name, traffic_type, max_bandwidth, policy_enabled FROM network_traffic_policies WHERE priority_level > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_policies;
SELECT policy_name, traffic_type, max_bandwidth FROM network_traffic_policies WHERE priority_level > 5 ORDER BY max_bandwidth DESC;
SELECT policy_name, max_bandwidth FROM network_traffic_policies WHERE traffic_type = 'VoIP' AND policy_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_ip_address, policy_name FROM network_devices JOIN network_traffic_policies ON network_devices.policy_id = network_traffic_policies.policy_id;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_type IN ('router', 'switch') ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM network_policies ORDER BY priority DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, subscriber_name, subscription_type FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium' ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_logs WHERE message LIKE 'Error%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT subscribers.subscriber_id, subscribers.subscriber_name, network_policies.policy_name FROM subscribers JOIN network_policies ON subscribers.policy_id = network_policies.policy_id ORDER BY subscribers.subscriber_id;
SELECT * FROM subscribers JOIN network_policies ON subscribers.policy_id = network_policies.policy_id WHERE subscribers.subscription_type = 'Premium' ORDER BY subscribers.subscriber_id DESC;

SELECT subscribers.subscriber_name, network_policies.policy_name FROM subscribers LEFT JOIN network_policies ON subscribers.policy_id = network_policies.policy_id WHERE subscribers.subscription_type = 'Free' ORDER BY subscribers.subscriber_name ASC;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_subscribers, network_policies.priority FROM subscribers JOIN network_policies ON subscribers.policy_id = network_policies.policy_id GROUP By network_policies.priority ORDER BY total_subscribers DESC, network_policies.priority ASC;

SELECT subscribers.subscriber_name, traffic_logs.timestamp FROM traffic_logs JOIN subscribers ON traffic_logs.subscriber_id = subscribers.subscriber_id WHERE traffic_logs.message LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY traffic_logs.timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT DISTINCT network_policies.policy_name, COUNT(*) AS total_subscribers FROM subscribers JOIN network_policies ON subscribers.policy_id = network_policies.policy_id GROUP BY network_policies.policy_name HAVING total_subscribers > 5 ORDER BY total_subscribers DESC, network_policies.policy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_classes;
SELECT class_name, priority FROM traffic_classes WHERE priority > 5;
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT rule_id, action, condition FROM policy_rules WHERE rule_id in (1, 3, 5);
SELECT log_id, timestamp, traffic_amount FROM traffic_logs WHERE traffic_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM traffic_classes ORDER BY priority DESC, class_name ASC
SELECT class_name, priority FROM traffic_classes WHERE priority > 3
SELECT * FROM policy_rules WHERE action = 'allow' AND condition LIKE '%specific%'
SELECT rule_id, class_name, action FROM policy_rules JOIN traffic_classes ON policy_rules.class_id = traffic_classes.class_id
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM network_policies;
SELECT policy_name, priority_level FROM network_policies ORDER BY priority_level DESC;
SELECT description FROM network_policies WHERE priority_level = 1;
SELECT * FROM traffic_logs WHERE action_taken = 'ALLOW';
SELECT log_id, source_device_id, destination_device_id, action_taken FROM traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE location='Headquarters' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT policy_name, priority_level FROM network_policies WHERE priority_level > 5;
SELECT count(rule_id) AS rule_count, classification_name FROM traffic_rules GROUP BY classification_id HAVING rule_count > 2 ORDER BY rule_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_logs WHERE action_taken='BLOCK' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT DISTINCT t.classification_name, r.rule_name FROM traffic_classification t JOIN traffic_rules r ON t.classification_id = r.classification_id;
